Posts.EditableText:
Just saw this ad for the largest gamebook ever; over 1200 pages and 19 endings. An actual printed gamebook, which I've not seen many of lately; and looks like it comes with a set of stickers to keep track of your attributes, which is an interesting way to do it, as well as a map and character sheet.

Might be fun to do it old-school.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/itbboardgames/alba-an-open-world-adventure-book

Posts.EditableText:
Whoa!

I find some old CYOAs at used book stores around here from time to time, but they are generally around 50 pages or so (I believe).
